Welcome to stem’s documentation!¶

Stem framework contains following modules:

stem.a¶

stem.SayHi()¶

to test imports

stem.core¶

stem.meta¶

Metadata is data that provides information about other data.

Alexander Nozik in his pet-project ‘DataForge’ sees metadata as a user-defined tree of values.

Based on the metadata and with the help of the metadata processor, Mr. Nozik decides what to do.

stem.task¶

description of task terms

stem.workspace¶

Modular software is a software which is decomposed in smaller pieces with standardied interfaces
